oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gauged B-L unification and cosmology
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: YAJNIK, UA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: left-right-symmetry
neutrino masses
electroweak baryogenesis
domain-walls
scale
breaking
decay
model
left-right
supersymmetry
grand unified theory
domain wall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We discuss some cosmological implications of low energy gauged B-L symmetry with and without supersymmetry. Generic possibility of leptogenesis from a domain wall driven first order phase transition is shown to be a characteristic of such models.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Workshop on Theoretical High Energy Physics,Roorkee, INDIA,MAR 15-20, 2007
